body: Quick and straight to the point

@tyler367 & Euphorism - Yeah, I was thinking the same thing but there has to be a person who do maintenance so he/she can manually delete the copies or the later version of the material being uploaded here...

I don't know how this site works, but so far, it seems like a bot leeching of other websites and mass pooling them here. That's probably why we are getting many situations like this with re-uploads and entire series getting upload each time a new chapter drops.
